scripts.check: concurrently -n fmt,lint,type,test,knip -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan" "bun run fmt:check" "bun run lint" "bun run typecheck" "bun run test" "bun run knip"
scripts.clean: turbo run clean && bun run clean:docker && git clean -xdf .cache .turbo node_modules
scripts.clean:docker: docker stop $(docker ps -aq) 2>/dev/null || true && docker rm $(docker ps -aq) 2>/dev/null || true && docker rmi $(docker images -q) -f 2>/dev/null || true && docker volume prune -f && docker network prune -f
scripts.dev: docker compose up -d --build && docker compose logs -f
scripts.fmt: concurrently -n turbo,shell,actions,pkg -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta" "bun run fmt:ts:fix" "bun run fmt:shell:fix" "bun run fmt:actions:fix" "bun run fmt:pkg:fix"
scripts.fmt:check: concurrently -n turbo,shell,actions,pkg -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta" "bun run fmt:ts:check" "bun run fmt:shell:check" "bun run fmt:actions:check" "bun run fmt:pkg:check"
scripts.lint: concurrently -n turbo,shell,actions,pkg,ws -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan" "bun run lint:ts:check" "bun run lint:shell:check" "bun run lint:actions:check" "bun run lint:pkg:check" "bun run lint:ws:check"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently -n turbo,pkg -c "blue,magenta" "bun run lint:ts:fix" "bun run lint:pkg:fix"
scripts.nuke: bun run clean && git clean -xdf bun.lock yarn.lock && bun install && bun run setup
scripts.prepare: workspace setup && bun run generate --filter='!@portfolio/infra' && bun run build && bun run publish
scripts.setup: turbo run up && bun run generate --filter='!@portfolio/infra' && bun run deploy
